author: wsjcom
title: Barbara Bush—Servant to American Society
text:
Regarding Peggy Dooley’s “When Barbara Bush Visited Wellesley” (op-ed, April 20): I hadn’t remembered that there were objections to Barbara Bush giving the graduation speech at Wellesley in 1990 for the reason, still much in vogue, that a woman taking care of her family full time and supporting her husband’s career was just “riding his coattails.”
I would love to know exactly when it was that we decided a woman who takes care of her children at home isn’t interesting in her own right. The original intention was probably a...
